name: Aldenoah - The Festival of Lights
description:
Play as Emas Jaax during his childhood participating in the Festival of Lights.  Run around the small town's center square in order to listen to Adepts from the Followers of the Deities tell you their favorite stories. 

The world of Aldenoah is based around the concept that elemental magic is effected by the wielder's emotions, and what sort of societies that could make.  This game was made over 6-months to give a small peek into the lore of this world that has been built up in my head for 7+ years now. 

It has an hour of gameplay at most, with many artistic elements crafted by myself and my talented family members.  I have no expectation of making waves with this, as this was just a personally loved story of mine that I needed to share.

I hope you enjoy, and thank you so much to anyone who plays my game.
